title: Suspect in Copenhagen mall shooting that killed three was known to psychiatric professionals, police say
content:
1. Suspect in Copenhagen mall shooting that killed three was known to psychiatric professionals, police say  CNN
  2. Copenhagen shooting: Gunman kills three in Field's shopping mall  BBC
  3. Denmark mall shooting update: 3 dead and 3 in critical condition, terrorism not ruled out  Fox News
  4. Several killed, other injured after shooting at Denmark shopping mall  12NewsNow
  5. 'Several' Killed in Copenhagen Mall Shooting, Cops Say  The Daily Beast
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: コペンハーゲンのショッピングモールで3人が死亡した銃撃事件の容疑者は、精神医学の専門家に知られていた、と警察は発表した。
警方称哥本哈根商场枪击案致3人死亡的嫌疑人为精神病专家所认识
警方稱哥本哈根商場槍擊案致3人死亡的嫌疑人爲精神病專家所認識
